name: epochtime-ai-plugins
description: Official Claude Code plugin marketplace by Epochtime AI - A curated collection of plugins to enhance your AI-powered development workflow

metadata.description: Epochtime AI's official marketplace providing comprehensive plugins for documentation crawling, database schema management with Atlas, and other development tools

plugins.name: doc-crawler-plugin
plugins.description: Systematic documentation crawler that converts online documentation into well-structured Claude Code skills

plugins.name: atlas-db-plugin
plugins.description: Comprehensive Atlas database schema migration tool integration with LSP support. Learn declarative and versioned workflows, schema definition, CI/CD integration, and ORM support

plugins.name: claude-code-doc-plugin
plugins.description: Complete Claude Code official documentation reference with 48 docs covering setup, plugins, MCP, enterprise deployment, and troubleshooting
